content: Mr. Cruz contacted teh DAV and the DAV is providing assistance along with the ACLU , and a senator. After reviewing the facts of the issue,they say they should have his money back to him by next week, and that they are fighting the inhumane treatment the VA gave Mr. Cruz, and calling a congressional meeting to discuss the way the VA is interpreting the law, as well as having the state of NY clarify to the VA the errors made. Thanks to all who gave advise on who to contact for the best results.
